    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Address
    Represents a physical address consisting of street, house number, city, and postal code.
    Address.Builder
    The Builder class provides a flexible way to construct an Address object.
    Bonus
    Represents a bonus value, typically used to store the bonus amount in a monetary format.
    Category
    Represents a category within the restaurant, such as a meal type or item classification.
    Category.Builder
    Builder class for constructing Category instances.
    Chef
    Represents a chef in the restaurant, inheriting basic properties from the Person class.
    Chef.Builder
    Builder class for constructing Chef instances.
    Contract
    Represents an employment contract for a worker, with details such as salary, contract dates, and contract type.
    Contract.ContractType
    Enum representing the type of contract.
    Deliverer
    Represents a deliverer, who is a type of Person with a specific contract and bonus.
    Deliverer.Builder
    A builder class for creating instances of Deliverer.
    DuplicateInputException
     
    Entity
    Represents a generic entity with a unique identifier.
    Ingredient
    Represents an ingredient used in the restaurant's meals.
    InvalidValueException
     
    Main
     
    Meal
    Represents a meal in the restaurant's menu.
    Meat
    Represents a contract for meat-based meals.
    MeatMeal
    Represents a meat-based meal in the restaurant.
    Order
    Represents an order in the restaurant system.
    Person
    Represents a person in the restaurant system.
    Restaurant
    Represents a restaurant in the system, containing details such as its name, address, available meals, and the personnel (chefs, waiters, deliverers) working at the restaurant.
    Vegan
    The Vegan interface defines the common behavior for vegan meals.
    VeganMeal
    Represents a vegan meal, which is a specific type of meal that adheres to vegan dietary requirements.
    Vegeterian
    Represents a contract for vegetarian meal types.
    VegeterianMeal
    Represents a vegetarian meal at the restaurant.
    Waiter
    Represents a waiter at the restaurant.
    Waiter.Builder
    A builder for constructing a Waiter object.
